1358220.name: Fantasy Grounds - D&D Adventurers League 09-09 Ruined Prospects
1358220.description:
D&D Adventurers League 09-09 Ruined Prospects

Elturel isn't the only city to have been claimed by Avernus; scores of towns and villages, long forgotten, litter the eternal battlefields. In one such place, a fallen Hellrider remains in stasis,
waiting for the right time to rise and battle evil once more. Has that time come at long last?
A Four to Six-Hour Adventure for Tier 2 Characters. Optimized for APL 8.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Danny Stratton
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included D&D fifth edition ruleset.
Recommended: D&D Basic Rules, D&D Player's Handbook or D&D Character Customization Pack, D&D Monster Manual
